message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for you, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.  I'm asking for $1,450,000.  What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product. I am willing to pay $1,350,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, the value of this product is truly significant, and I believe my initial offer was more than fair.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $1,400,000?
I understand your position, Alice. I am still committed to finding a fair price for both of us. I would like to propose $1,375,000 as a compromise.
